background: A gem factory uses two types of drills, high intensity and low intensity, to process gems. Each type of drill has a capacity of how many gems it can process per day and requires a certain amount of water to operate efficiently.
constraints: Number of high intensity drills is an integer
Number of low intensity drills is an integer
Number of high intensity drills is non-negative
Number of low intensity drills is non-negative
The high intensity drill can process at most CapHigh gems per day
The low intensity drill can process at most CapLow gems per day
Total number of gems processed by high and low intensity drills must be at least TotalGems
Total water used by high and low intensity drills must not exceed TotalWater
At most MaxPercentHigh percent of the drills can be high intensity ones
At least MinLowDrills must be low intensity drills
objective: Minimize the total number of drills needed
description: A gem factory has two drills, a high intensity one and a low intensity one. Each day, the high intensity drill can process \var{CapHigh} gems and requires \var{WaterHigh} units of water to dissipate heat. Each day, the low intensity drill can process \var{CapLow} gems and requires \var{WaterLow} units of water to dissipate heat. Each day the factory must process \var{TotalGems} gems and they have available \var{TotalWater} units of water. Since the high intensity drill produces a lot of noise pollution, at most \var{MaxPercentHigh} of the drills can be high intensity ones. Further, at least \var{MinLowDrills} should be low intensity drills. How many of each drill should be used to minimize the total number of drills needed?

parameters.definition: Processing capacity of the high intensity drill per day
Water usage of the high intensity drill per day
Processing capacity of the low intensity drill per day
Water usage of the low intensity drill per day
Total number of gems that must be processed each day
Total amount of water available each day
Maximum percentage of high intensity drills
Minimum number of low intensity drills required
